text: Rachel Roberts (September 20, 1927 â€“ November 26, 1980) was a Welsh actress who starred in many movies and stage acts. She became well known for her fervour and strong passion. She starred in the 1953 movie Valley of Song. While in Los Angeles, Roberts committed suicide at age 53 with barbiturates and alcohol. == Other websites == * Category:1927 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Drug-related suicides in the United States Category:Welsh movie actors Category:Welsh television actors
title: Rachel Roberts
